Observed at: North East Margaree 1:00 PM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
